channel.title: Afew Basic Problems
channel.description:
Well i have afew problems. Below ill post them and hopefully you can help!
Source: Project - LTM [317 DELTA]
Problem 1: Changing Level to Weild
For d claws on my server you need 60 defence to weild. How do i change that to 60 Attack??
Problem 2: Autospawn
I know the autospawn code but how does it work? where does npc id go and where does the coords go?
Problem 3: Npc Overhead Chat
This isnt much of a problem, all i need is the code layout for an npc overhead chat, i know where to add it.
If you can answer 2 out of these 3 please reply. Your help is much appretiated! Thanks!

@orcashark wrote:

Okay so nobody knows anything about my other 2 problems? :S

item.title: Afew Basic Problems
item.dc:creator: @orcashark orcashark
item.description:
@orcashark wrote:

Alright good so far. I just needed to know where the coords went cause i saw a shit load of ids and i didnt know what the coords were.

Read full topic

item.title: Afew Basic Problems
item.dc:creator: @TrippleV TrippleV
item.description:
@TrippleV wrote:

Add this at the top off your Autospawn.cfg and copy it every time you are gonna insert a new npc, the you know exatully where to place what in the code!

//spawn = npcid coordsx coordsy height rangex1 rangey1 rangex2 rangey2 walktype-discription

REMEMBER TO SEPARATE EACH WORD WITH TAB
This will not work!

EXAMPLE Spawn = 0 3218 3218 0 0 0 0 0 1 Hans

It should look something like this but dont copy this cuz i haven’t tab’ed these cuz i cant tab in this forum!

Example 2 spawn = 0 3218 3218 0 0 0 0 0 1 Hans

Hope it help’d!
+rep if u like it!

Read full topic

item.title: Afew Basic Problems
item.dc:creator: @Usagi Usagi
item.description:
@Usagi wrote:

[font=courier]The autospawn for question two is stored in a data file you will have somewhere in your server folder. its usually called autospawn.cfg. It grabs that list and puts it in arrays yaddayah, Im not sure exactly how it works but that sounds right. [/font]

Read full topic
